attributes.action: No to the increase of train fares.
attributes.additional_details: The UK's national train fares are severally high as it is. it costs a paying adult £10 for a one way single as it is, only to travel 10 miles. This is not acceptable. However the national rail are agreeing to raise the fares again, enabling the fares to be as much as £15 to travel 10 miles. It is time to put a stop to these horrendous fares.
